description: Get the event configuration for a particular resource identifier.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: Resource identifier to opt in for event messaging.

parameters.name: IdentifierType
parameters.description: Identifier type of the particular resource identifier for event configuration.

nested_items.name: DeviceRegistrationState
nested_items.description: Event configuration for the device registration state event.

nested_items.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID device registration state event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: Proximity
nested_items.description: Event configuration for the proximity event.

nested_items.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID proximity event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: DevEuiEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Dev EUI join event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID join event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: Event configuration for the connection status event.

nested_items.name: GatewayEuiEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the gateway EUI connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessGatewayIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless gateway ID connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: MessageDeliveryStatus
nested_items.description: Event configuration for the message delivery status event.

nested_items.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID message delivery status event topic is enabled or disabled.
